name: AWS Cognito
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS Cognito 节点。主要用于: Sends data to AWS Cognito

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: user

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

userPool.name: userPool
userPool.description: Select the user pool to retrieve
userPool.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Pool | 作用: Select the user pool to retrieve | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

newGroupName.name: newGroupName
newGroupName.description: The name of the new group to create
newGroupName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group Name | 作用: The name of the new group to create | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: forceAliasCreation (值: None) - Whether this parameter is used only if the phone_number_verified or email_verified attribute is set to true. Otherwise, it is ignored. If set to true, and the phone number or email address specified in the UserAttributes parameter already exists as an alias with a different user, the alias will be migrated. If set to false, an AliasExistsException error is thrown if the alias already exists.
userAttributes (值: None) - Attributes to update for the user
desiredDeliveryMediums (值: None) - Specify how to send the welcome message
temporaryPasswordOptions (值: None) - The user's temporary password that will be valid only once. If not set, Amazon Cognito will automatically generate one for you.

group.name: group
group.description: Select the group you want to remove the user from
group.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group | 作用: Select the group you want to remove the user from | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

includeUsers.name: includeUsers
includeUsers.description: Whether to include a list of users in the group
includeUsers.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Users | 作用: Whether to include a list of users in the group | 默认值: False

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50 | (必填项)

newUserName.name: newUserName
newUserName.description: Depending on the user pool settings, this parameter requires the username, the email, or the phone number. No whitespace is allowed.
newUserName.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Name | 作用: Depending on the user pool settings, this parameter requires the username, the email, or the phone number. No whitespace is allowed. | (必填项)

user.name: user
user.description: Select the user you want to remove from the group
user.natural_language_description: 参数名: User | 作用: Select the user you want to remove from the group | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

userAttributes.name: userAttributes
userAttributes.description: Attributes to update for the user
userAttributes.natural_language_description: 参数名: User Attributes | 作用: Attributes to update for the user | 默认值: {'attributes': []} | (必填项)

requestOptions.name: requestOptions
requestOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Request Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: allowUnauthorizedCerts (值: None) - Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible
proxy (值: None) - HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
